issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Issue: Executing different code file depending whether simulator or device is used

Reproduce issue:
1. Create a theme in config.js (example theme newsapp)
2. Create an app.js in ProjectName->themes->newsapp->assets->app.js
3. Run project on simulator will use app.js at path path ProjectName->Resources->iphone->app.js
Run app on device will use path ProjectName->Resources->app.js
fields.summary: Using different code file depending whether device or simulator is used

comments.body: This is a duplicate of TIMOB-14884. This is a platform issue, not an alloy one, and has already been resolved in the latest CI builds of Titanium. Look at the linked ticket for details.
